p: As expected, the addition of plant extract to both raw MTE ( Figure 1a no. 2) and MTE-mp ( Figure 1a no. 3) changed the color of the blank emulgel ( Figure 1a no. 1) from white to pale yellow (nos. 3 and 2). MTE, however, was not completely solubilized, resulting in a non-homogeneous distribution in the biphasic system, as demonstrated by the presence of brown agglomerates of the extract in emulgel no. 2 ( Figure 1a).
